fr.emse.simulator.astar

Interface Heuristic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EuclideanDistanceHeuristic, ManhattanDistanceHeuristic

    public interface Heuristic
    This interface is used to represent a generic heuristic, computed using getGlobalCost(SimulationMap, LocalCost, Cell, Cell).
    Author:
    Gauthier Picard (EMSE) : picard@emse.fr

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getGlobalCost(SimulationMap simulationMap, LocalCost localCost, Cell start, Cell target)
      The method returns the cost of a complete movement in a SimulationMap from a Cell to another.

    • Method Detail

      • getGlobalCost

        float getGlobalCost(SimulationMap simulationMap,
                  LocalCost localCost,
                  Cell start,
                  Cell target)
        The method returns the cost of a complete movement in a SimulationMap from a Cell to another.
        Parameters:
        simulationMap - the map the heuristic is relative to
        start - the starting cell
        target - the objective cell
        Returns:
        the cost of the movement
